rescuecore2.messages.control

Class KSUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.messages.AbstractMessage
      • rescuecore2.messages.control.KSUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Control, Message

    public class KSUpdate
extends AbstractMessage
implements Control
    A broadcast update from the kernel.
